pullrequest.title: Disable loading nested models in DART and Simbody

content.raw:
ya I also tried to make loading only part of the model (links, joints and ignore nested models) work but still experimented crashes. One cause of the crash I found is due to the fact that you can specify joints between links inside nested models on the top level `<model>` element, e.g.

~~~
<model>
  <model name="nested">...</model>
  <joint>
    <parent>nested::link0</parent>
    <child>nested::link1</child>
  </joint>
</model>
~~~

We would need separate logic to handle loading joints in this case. After that, I decided that to just disable loading the whole model overall since code freeze is already here.
content.html:
ya I also tried to make loading only part of the model (links, joints and ignore nested models) work but still experimented crashes. One cause of the crash I found is due to the fact that you can specify joints between links inside nested models on the top level <model> element, e.g.

<model>
  <model name="nested">...</model>
  <joint>
    <parent>nested::link0</parent>
    <child>nested::link1</child>
  </joint>
</model>

We would need separate logic to handle loading joints in this case. After that, I decided that to just disable loading the whole model overall since code freeze is already here.
